subject: Baseball
Fenway Park (Boston)
lead_paragraph: Scott Kazmir continued his dominance at Fenway Park, stifling the Red Sox for one run through six innings as the Tampa Bay Rays cruised to a 7-2 victory.
snippet: Scott Kazmir continued his dominance at Fenway Park, stifling the Red Sox for one run through six innings as the Tampa Bay Rays cruised to a 7-2 victory.
